item.title: Nila Kaigirathu â€“ Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This song has two versions. One sung by a little girl and the other by an adult male voice(Hariharan). It is melodious and beautiful. They have some variations in lyrics so I have chosen to translate the one by the child.
